title: Mercury Transit in the 11th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Mercuryâ€™s transit through the eleventh house activates gains, networks, and future-oriented thinking. Communication with friends, teams, and professional circles increases, bringing new ideas and opportunities. This phase favors collaboration, goal planning, and leveraging contacts for progress. While intellectual exchange supports growth, over-commitment or scattered social energy can dilute outcomes if priorities are unclear.

sections.heading: Career
points: Avoid promising more than you can deliver

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income linked to communication and planning

sections.heading: Mental / Inner State
points: Mental clutter from too many ideas

closing: This transit amplifies gains through communication and connections. Clear priorities turn ideas into tangible progress.
